name: DAIInterestRateModelV2
description: Compound's DAIInterestRateModel Contract (version 2). The parameterized model described in section 2.4 of the original Compound Protocol whitepaper. Version 2 modifies the original interest rate model by increasing the "gap" or slope of the model prior to the "kink" from 0.05% to 2% with the goal of "smoothing out" interest rate changes as the utilization rate increases.

functionDecorators.name: dsrPerBlock
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the Dai savings rate per block.

functionDecorators.name: getBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current borrow rate per block, with the error code expected by the market.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of cash in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of borrows in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reserves in the market.

functionDecorators.name: getSupplyRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the current supply interest rate per block including the Dai savings rate.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The total amount of cash the market has.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The total amnount of reserves the market has.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactorMantissa
parameterDecorators.description: The current reserve factor the market has.

functionDecorators.name: poke
functionDecorators.description: Resets the baseRate and multiplier per block based on the stability fee and Dai savings rate.

functionDecorators.name: utilizationRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of cash in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of borrows in the market.

parameterDecorators.name: reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused).
